sentence.Network_en: He is still, in the eyes of some, an irredeemable misogynist.
sentence.Network_cn: 在某些人的眼里，他仍然是个无可救药的厌恶女性者。

entry.def: A misogynist is a man who dislikes women.
Misogynist attitudes or actions are ones that involve or show a strong dislike of women.

means.word_mean: 1. a misanthrope who dislikes women in particular

auth_sentence.content: It is not simply a misogynist anti-women thing.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is not simply a misogynist anti-women thing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is not simply a misogynist anti-women thing.

auth_sentence.content: He did not flirt, but was certainly no misogynist.

auth_sentence.content: I've been called a misogynist, a mediocrity, a moron.
